column2: Hello there - I am the personality-less chatbot. What would you like to do?
Nothing completed. What would you like to do?
Yes - it sure is some interesting weather we're having right now- isn't it?
Boy howdy tell me about it! I'm sweating!
Yes - I've been struggling to start my car in these frigid mornings!
It almost makes you wish for a thunderstorm - hey!
